participant_1.background:
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I drive a family-friendly SUV that can handle any weather conditions.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I enjoy the peace and quiet of the woods when I go hiking on the weekends.
i read fantasy fiction novels.

participant_2.background:
I do not see my family very often, but I am close to them.
My spouse is a software engineer and my child is a preschooler.
i have 2 sisters.
I have been learning more about the business through my parents and have been taking on more responsibilities.
i like classic radio programs.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hey! I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing well too. I'm just hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to some death metal.
Nice! I don't listen to death metal much, but I do enjoy some metal every now and then.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to classic rock and pop.
Oh cool, I like classic rock too. Do you have any favorite bands?
Yeah, I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Led Zeppelin.
Those are all great bands! I also like the Doors and Pink Floyd.
Oh yeah, I love the Doors too! I haven't listened to Pink Floyd much, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out. They're one of my favorite bands.
I will, thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh cool! What kind of software do you work on?
I mostly work on web applications.
Oh interesting. I've always been interested in software engineering, but I don't think I have the math skills for it.
It's not as hard as you think. And there are a lot of resources available to help you learn.
I might have to look into it.
You should! It's a great field to be in.
Yeah, I've heard that. Thanks for the advice!
No problem
